WorkItem.Description: If you want to consume CopyingRowClipboardContent to modify the contents, you're out of luck.  Even though this is the intended purpose of the event (as documented in help), there is nothing in DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs you can modify that affects the data copied to the clipboard.
WorkItem.Summary: CopyingRowClipboardContent redundant as DataGridRowClipboardEventArgs is not editable
